data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azevedo, C. O. (2006): Two new genera of Sclerodermini (Hymenoptera: Bethylidae, Epyrinae) with large, scolebythid-like prosternums. Zootaxa 1191: 35-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.2646191|6 occurrences
